aboutme_text_1: I am ThirstyWater, you can also call me "Soft Water". I am a programmer specializing in network technology development.
aboutme_text_2: I have a niche hobby, which is "bubbles". I love seeing pictures of girls wrapped in bubbles, floating lightly, they feel so cute www
